aircraft.value: Minotaur Heavy - AC-4442-781 at Base Delta

defect_observed.value: Exhaust gas temperature margin reduction. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel Injection component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 22/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 25/08/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 25/08/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 26/08/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 29/08/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel Injection component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
